io.springlets.data.web.datatables

Class DatatablesSort

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.data.domain.Sort
      • io.springlets.data.web.datatables.DatatablesSort
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Iterable<org.springframework.data.domain.Sort.Order>

    public class DatatablesSort
extends org.springframework.data.domain.Sort
    Extends Sort to be used with the datatables sorting parameters. This way you can use this information to create Spring Data queries. See https://datatables.net/manual/server-side
    Author:
    Cèsar Ordiñana at http://www.disid.com[DISID Corporation S.L.]
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
